Landing.heroTitle:
Orchestrate your AI CLIs
from a single terminal
Landing.heroDescription: Intelligently delegate to Gemini, Claude or Codex. Parallelize your tasks with Swarm mode. Track your quotas in real-time.
Landing.featuresDescription: One CLI to manage all your local AI agents.
Landing.feature1Desc: Jarvis analyzes your task and delegates to the optimal agent: Gemini for UI, Claude for logic, Codex for tests.
Landing.feature2Desc: Automatically decompose a complex task into parallel subtasks executed by multiple agents simultaneously.
Landing.feature3Desc: Visualize your Gemini, Claude and OpenAI usage in real-time. No more billing surprises.

Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.welcome: Welcome back, {name}. Your agents are ready.

Features.pageDescription: Jarvis isn't just a chatbot wrapper. It's a multi-agent orchestrator designed to maximize the efficiency of your AI CLIs.
